Package com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.communication

Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.communication.NotificationController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/notifications") public class NotificationController extends Object
Controller for handling requests related to Notifications.
